function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Climate change impact on urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rural-urban migration and pressure on infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagion hotspots in slums and informal settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of inequalities and poverty","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of climate change on vulnerable populations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integrated data infrastructure leading to difficulty in data collection and sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data poverty and poor data leading to inadequate response and perpetuating inequality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate supply chain resilience leading to disruption in essential supplies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"National considerations and geopolitical interests may prioritize big nations over international collaboration during global crises.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges being interconnected may require a complex system approach to resilience enforcement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Capacity and resilience gaps across the economy","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of organization public education campaigns leading to the spread of disinformation and misinformation about diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation driven majorly by social
